title: Cant Join The Game
body:
Since The New Update my client has been bugged out. The ranked matches have been shut down however, its not making any change at all. I have been trying the normal 5 v 5 with a friend and always one of us is endlessly  stuck on the finding match screen and one on the match has been accepted menu.
Arams seem to work as the only game mode in the game that is playable. I havent yet tried normal 5 v 5 as solo or the 3 v 3. I would really appreciate any background information from any of the rioters. Please answer the poll as well so we can know how is the issue serious. Thank You

replies.body: It's not necessarily an issue with the patch, but a server issue which our network team is still investigating.  Updates are being posted on the[ platform reset post](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tbyHzasZ-eune-emergency-platform-restart) here.
